Salesforce Components - EmailMessageTrigger

Trigger EmailMessageTrigger

trigger EmailMessageTrigger on EmailMessage (
  before insert,
  after insert,
  before update,
  after update,
  before delete,
  after delete,
  after undelete
)

Description: Handles email message trigger actions References:
